knowMe.description: I'm an independent game developer with a passion for creating unique pixel art games. After graduating in Computer Science. I've been honing my skills in game development, pixel art, and sound design, and I'm excited to share my passion with you.
knowMe.descriptionHidden: I decided to pursue my dream of making games that combine nostalgic aesthetics with modern gameplay mechanics. I love creating immersive experiences that tell meaningful stories. With a strong focus on pixel art and fluid animations, I'm committed to delivering engaging and visually appealing games that captivate players. Let's collaborate and bring your ideas to life.

whatIDo.title: Game Development
whatIDo.description: Design and develop 2D games using Unity and Godot engines with focus on engaging gameplay mechanics

whatIDo.title: Pixel Art & Animation
whatIDo.description: Create charming pixel art assets and fluid animations for retro-style games

whatIDo.title: Sound Design
whatIDo.description: Compose chiptune music and create retro-style sound effects for enhanced game feel

whatIDo.title: Community Building
whatIDo.description: Engage with players through Discord and social media, gathering feedback and building a community
